text: @realDonaldTrump I hear @TishJame will doing a little Law & Order very soon. As long as COVID-19 precautions are not necessary I hope they arrest you right after @JoeBiden takes his oath of office. That way you be able to hear the millions of people in attendance shouting: "LOCK HIM UP"
